name: Dungeons and Doggies
description:
Welcome to Dungeons and Doggies, a 3D point-and-click game. It is a lighthearted dungeon game.

The player is a dog knight who must navigate through a dungeon. Collect bones along the way to get stronger and try to shake annoying enemies.  Once you find your way through each level, you can escape the dungeon! Find keys to go through gateways.

Instructions:

Point and click to move, right-click to attack
